markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Ghoul Gnawer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2144)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 30

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 11">[Ghoul Gnawer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2144)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Ghoul" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=218" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #184: The Ghouls Hunger](/Sources.aspx?ID=147) pg. 23</row>

**Perception** +18; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Kelish](/Languages.aspx?ID=38), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +21, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +21, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +23, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +23, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +23, [Kabriri Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +21, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +21, [Secret Eater Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +21, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +19

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** +5

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +7
</row>

**Items**
hooded robe, [_staff of necromancy_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=360)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 

**Fort** +18 

**Ref** +21 

**Will** +24 

</row>

**HP** 190
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +19 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 2d10+12 piercing plus ghoul fever and paralysis

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +19 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 2d8+10 slashing plus paralysis

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_staff_ +19 ([two-hand 1d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 2d8+10 bludgeoning

**Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 34
- **Cantrips (6th)**
[Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Haunting Hymn](/Spells.aspx?ID=924), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Sigil](/Spells.aspx?ID=286)
- **4th**
[Chroma Leach](/Spells.aspx?ID=679), [Clairvoyance](/Spells.aspx?ID=40), [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Talking Corpse](/Spells.aspx?ID=329) (4 slots)
- **5th**
[Abyssal Plague](/Spells.aspx?ID=1), [Invoke Spirits](/Spells.aspx?ID=937), [Rip the Spirit](/Spells.aspx?ID=986), [Wall of Flesh](/Spells.aspx?ID=727) (4 slots)
- **6th**
[Dominate](/Spells.aspx?ID=87), [Scrying](/Spells.aspx?ID=268), [Spirit Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=301), [Vampiric Exsanguination](/Spells.aspx?ID=353) (3 slots)

**Consume Flesh** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirements** The ghoul gnawer is adjacent to the corpse of a creature that died within the last hour; **Effect** The ghoul gnawer devours a chunk of the corpse and regains 5d6 Hit Points. It can regain Hit Points from any given corpse only once.

**Drain Corpse** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** The ghoul gnawer uses Consume Flesh; **Effect** In addition to gaining Hit Points, using Consume Flesh refreshes one spell slot the cultist has already expended.

**Ghoul Fever**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) **Saving Throw** DC 29 Fortitude; **Stage 1** carrier with no effect (1 day); **Stage 2** 3d6 negative damage and regains half as many hit Points from all healing (1 day); **Stage 3** as stage 2 (1 day); **Stage 4** 3d6 negative damage and gains no benefit from healing (1 day); **Stage 5** as stage 4 (1 day); Stage 6 dead, and rises as a [ghoul](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=52) the next midnight

**Paralysis**  ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) Any living, non-[elf](/Traits.aspx?ID=58) creature hit by a ghoul gnawer's attack must succeed at a DC 27 Fortitude save or become [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28). The creature can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each such save.

**Swift Leap** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) The ghoul gnawer jumps up to half its Speed. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-52" />
name: Ghoul Gnawer

It can regain Hit Points from any given corpse only once. Drain Corpse Reaction (Occult) Frequency once per day; Trigger The ghoul gnawer uses Consume Flesh; Effect In addition to gaining Hit Points, using Consume Flesh refreshes one spell slot the cultist has already expended. Ghoul Fever (Disease) Saving Throw DC 29 Fortitude; Stage 1 carrier with no effect (1 day); Stage 2 3d6 negative damage and regains half as many hit Points from all healing (1 day); Stage 3 as stage 2 (1 day); Stage 4 3d6 negative damage and gains no benefit from healing (1 day); Stage 5 as stage 4 (1 day); Stage 6 dead, and rises as a ghoul the next midnight Paralysis (Incapacitation, Occult, Necromancy) Any living, non-elf creature hit by a ghoul gnawer's attack must succeed at a DC 27 Fortitude save or become paralyzed.
